hero.title: Hoang Anh Tu
hero.subtitle: Developer with over 2 years of experience in web and mobile development.

about.title: About Me
about.description: I am a passionate Developer with over 2 years of experience in developing web and mobile applications. I love creating products that bring real value to users and am always looking for opportunities to learn and grow.

skills.title: Skills
skills.frontendDesc: Modern frontend technologies for building responsive user interfaces.
skills.backendDesc: Backend - Server-side technologies and API development.
skills.databaseDesc: Database management and data storage solutions.

projects.mmtbDesc: A platform that digitizes maintenance processes, equipment and incident management in factories â€“ enabling machine condition monitoring, reducing downtime, and improving operational efficiency.

experience.title: Work Experience
experience.fresherDesc: Participated in the development and maintenance of web and mobile applications, ensuring product performance and features. Learned and applied new technologies to improve the development process. Collaborated with other teams to ensure seamless integration between frontend and backend.
experience.internDesc: Learned and analyzed customer requirements, provided technical support and problem-solving. Assisted the development team in deploying and maintaining systems. Learned about software development processes and project management.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.description: If you have any questions or want to discuss a project, feel free to reach out to me. I'm always ready to help and collaborate.
